item.title: August Auto Sales: Bajaj, TVS, Eicher Drive Exports Higher; Mahindra, Ashok Leyland Show Mixed Trends
item.description: Festive demand, GST changes, and rare earth imports are likely to shape momentum next month for the auto sector.

item.title: From Voltas, Adani Power To GIC: SEBI Analysts Flag Key Levels To Watch
item.description: Analysts flagged weakness in Motilal Oswal, Angel One, and GIC, citing bearish chart signals. Meanwhile, Adani Power retained long-term strength, whil...

item.title: EV Buzz: Ola Electric Rallies 55% In Three Weeks, Ather Hits New High After Unveiling Next-Gen Scooter
item.description: While Ola’s momentum continues to grow, an analyst flags fundamental concerns on the sustainability of its rally.

item.title: PG Electroplast Sees Relief Rally On ₹1,000 Crore Project Push, But SEBI Analyst Flags Weak Structure
item.description: Despite the rebound, technical charts suggest weakness until it reclaims ₹600, according to the analyst.

item.title: Windlas Biotech Shares: ‘Buy on Dips’ Until Breakout, Says SEBI Analyst
item.description: A breakout above ₹1,025 could trigger an uptrend towards ₹1,160–₹1,350, according to the analyst.
